alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 10:19PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Craven and southwestern Carteret Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1019 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Broad Creek, or 7 miles southwest of Newport, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Pine Knoll Shores, Broad Creek, Wildwood, Bogue, Crab Point Village, Mitchell Village and Indian Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
